Summary: Silver disc edge over Wichita, KS intersection Central & Tyler
divs: Sighting DetailsI am submitting this for another person... Wichita Kansas heading south on Tyler Rd. In center turning lane about to head left on 9th street. Saw what appeared to be the edge of a disc-shaped UFO directly over the intersection of Central & Tyler. It was bright metallic silver, about as wide as the intersection and hovered about as high above the street lights as the street lights were from the ground. She took a second look because she couldn't believe it. It was still there. There were striated clouds all around it. It was stationary. She thought it was a reflection at first but it didn't move when she moved. She made her turn and circled back within 30 seconds. It was gone.
